title: Beef stew with parsley dumplings
ingredients: ['1 kg (2 lb 4 oz) lean beef stewing steak', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '400 g (14 oz) onions, cut into wedges', '250 g (9 oz) carrots, sliced', '250 g (9 oz) swede, diced', '1 tablespoon plain white flour', '2 teaspoons dried mixed herbs', '400 g (14 oz) canned chopped tomatoes', '600 ml (1 pint) meat stock', 'Salt and black pepper', 'For the dumplings', '175 g (6 oz) self-raising white flour', '50 g (1Â¾ oz) 70 per cent fat spread', '3 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
